about.whoAmiDescription: I am always eager to learn new things and improve myself. I enjoy being involved in creative processes and turning my ideas into reality. I take great pleasure in being productive and seeing the results. I strive to continuously advance myself through the experiences I gain from different projects.

projects.portfolioContent:
Portfolio site project that I worked on during my free time throughout my internship.
I designed the frontend using React.js and integrated a blog feature into the site by using the API I developed with ASP.NET.

You are currently viewing this project!
projects.hrContent:
In this application, which we developed to optimize human resources management for companies, site administrators can view and edit companies and their managers; company employees can submit advance payment and leave requests to their managers through the platform, and managers can respond to these requests.

In this project, I focused on Identity and JWT structures and took on various tasks on both the back-end and front-end sides.
projects.eCommerceContent: I developed the Order entity using Entity Framework for an MVC-based e-commerce application. I added features to track, update, and manage order statuses in the admin panel.
